markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skill Mastery (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=731) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 229 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Rogue](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=10)

**Prerequisites**
[Rogue Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=727); trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill

</column>

---

Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master and in another of your skills from trained to expert. You gain a skill feat associated with one of the skills you chose.

**Special** You can select this feat up to five times.
name: Skill Mastery (Rogue)
prerequisite: Rogue Dedication; trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill
prerequisite_markdown: [Rogue Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=727); trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill
